page.title: 01Our D.Block
page.content: Our D.Block is mainly{farming land but it includes the main part of Alcester and also Oversley Wood. Alcester is built on the site of a Roman Town.Many Roman remains have been found. Alcester is still a market town,but it is growing bigger.Ragley Hall is near Alcester where hunts go on,it is also open to the public.Opposite Ragley Hall is Arrow Mill,now a restaurant and bar. The centre of everything is the High Street with St Nicholas' churchat the end.Shops line the street.There is a grammer school and two comprehensive schools.Also there are two junior and infant schools,and playgroups.Alcester is twinned with the French town of Vallet.Altogether Alcester is a friendly little town.
